fields.summary: TestJobHistoryServer fails some times with 'java.lang.AssertionError: Address already in use'

fields.description: Every once in a while org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TestJobHistoryServer fails due to a timeout.

export COUNT=0; while [ 1 == 1 ] ; do echo -n "Tested $COUNT times.
